text: Optic atrophy 90% Visual impairment 90% Nystagmus 7.5% Abnormality of metabolism/homeostasis - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Cystoid macular degeneration - Glaucoma - Macular atrophy - Microphthalmia - Nyctalopia - Pigmentary retinal degeneration - Retinal degeneration - Slitlike anterior chamber angles in children - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
